definition: large edible rays having a long snout and thick tail with pectoral fins continuous with the head, move along on skates
details:
noun
- large edible rays having a long snout and thick tail with pectoral fins continuous with the head
- sports equipment that is worn on the feet to enable the wearer to glide along and to be propelled by the alternate actions of the legs
verb
- move along on skates
= example: move along on skates
